t=int(raw_input())
while(t>0):
    a=raw_input();
    sum=0
    for x in range(65,91):
        count=a.count(chr(x))
        d=count/2;
        r=count%2
        sum=sum+d+r
    for x in range(97,123):
        count=a.count(chr(x))
        d=count/2;
        r=count%2
        sum=sum+d+r
    print sum
    t=t-1
